title: Generating Draft Order
custom_steps:
Log into Ebis as "club-BOC-ama" and enter password "street80" click on the Rule 4 Drafty tab and wait for the Pre Draft tab to load.
Scroll down the page in the Pre-draft tab and click on "Edit
Click on Generate Draft Order on the bottom right.
custom_expected:
Both logging on and the pre-draft tab should take less than 30 seconds to load.
Page switches to Edit mode
You see loading for a while (shouldn't be longer than 1 minute) and then you see blue notifications that the draft order was successfully saved. Then you get re-directed to the Draft Order page which should be in view mode.

title: Draft Order
custom_steps: Click on the "Draft Order" tab on the top right, and wait for the page to fully load.
custom_expected: This action should take less than 30 seconds to load.

title: Draft Day
custom_steps: Click on the "Draft Day" tab on the top right, and wait for the page to fully load.
custom_expected: This action should take less than 1 minute to load.

title: Start Timer
custom_expected: The Start button will turn into the Pause button, and make sure that the Round says 1 and the Overall (pick) says 1 also.

title: Submission of Player from Club
custom_steps:
Sign out of "club- BOC-ama" and sign in as "club-HOU-ama" and enter password "fire30" and click on the Rule 4 Draft tab.
Click on the "Draft Day" tab on the top right, and wait for the page to fully load.
Select a player and drag him to the selected player colum and click submit.
custom_expected:
Pre-draft tab should take less than 30 seconds to load.
This action should take less than 1 minute to load.
After you complete this action the selected player column grays out and the submit button is disabled.

title: Approval of Player from BOC
custom_steps:
Sign out of "club-HOU-ama" and sign in as "club-BOC-ama" enter password "street80" and click on the Rule 4 Draft tab.
Click on the draft day tab and press aprove.
Click on the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
Pre-draft tab should take less than 30 seconds to load.
You will see the player selected by the Houston Astro's in the Submitted player section.
Player is cleared from the Submitted Player section and he appears in the draft results widget just underneath

title: Addition of player to System
custom_steps: Go to a different tab and type in eBis.mlb.com, than in the quick search type the name of the player that was just drafted.
custom_expected: This should take no longer than a minute to load.

title: Loading Test
custom_steps:
Sign out of "club-HOU-ama" and sign in as "club-BOC-ama" enter password "street80" and click on the Rule 4 Draft tab.
Click on the Scouting & Drafts tab.
Scroll down to the Rule 4 - Draft History widget the row should be  populated for the year 2014.
There should also be another row for the following year.
Click on the Draft Display tab.
Click on the "Connectivity" tab on the top right and wait for the page to fully load.
Click on the "Draft Display" tab and wait for the page to fully load.
Click on the "Post Draft" tab on the top right and wait for the page to fully load.
Log off and sign back in with "club-HOU-ama" password "fire30" click on the Rule 4 Drafty tab and wait for the Pre Draft tab to load.
Click on the "Draft Order" tab on the top right, and wait for the page to fully load.
Click on the "Draft Display" tab and wait for the page to fully load.
custom_expected:
Pre-draft tab should take less than 30 seconds to load.
This should take about 30 seconds to load.
The status should now say "Drafted" and all the other categories should be populated with the new correct information.
It should be a player status set to "Pending Eligible" and Origin as "Re-Draft"
Make sure that the same player that you approved is next to the club that selected him.
The "Connectivity" tab should load within 20 seconds
This action should take less than 20 seconds to load.
This action should take less than 20 seconds to load.
Both logging on and the pre-draft tab should take less than 30 seconds to load.
This action should take less than 30 seconds to load.
This action should take less than 20 seconds to load.

title: Check Commissioner Screen
custom_steps:
Log into club-boc-ama-1
Go to Rule 4 Draft
Go to Draft Day Tab
Click on Commissioner Screen
custom_expected: Commissioner screen shows Awaiting Player Pick when no player is in the Submitted players box
